articles.title: Serie A, Roma-Cagliari 2-0: Giallorossi victorious thanks to Malen
articles.summary: Roma didn't stumble in the Monday evening positives and won 2-0 against a slightly dull Cagliari. The Giallorossi recovered immediately after the bad defeat in Udine and dominated without problems against the Sardinians coached by Pisacane.
